authors.name: Christian Tietze, mini patch by Roman Garanin

title: Extract Note (folgezettel prefix id)
description: Zettel Refactoring: You have a text fragment that can be grouped together. Move the selected text into a new note and replace it with a link to the note. Includes mini patch to the original plugin from Christian Tietze: 'new note' dialog presets filename using current note's filename (first part before space), assuming it's folgezettel id.
